entry.question: Can I play this card if I don’t have a Wrecker on my team?
Can I play this card if my opponent doesn’t have any Secret Actions in play?
When I play this card, do I have to do one damage to one of my Wreckers?
entry.answer: No, you do not. The “may” makes this an optional ability.

entry.question: When I play this card, can I do 1 damage to one of my Wreckers if my opponent doesn’t have a Secret Action in play?
When I play this card and I have a Specialist, do I have to make my opponent scrap a card?
Can my opponent scrap the Secret Action for the second ability that I returned to their hand with the first ability?
entry.answer: Yes. Abilities on the card happen in order.
